events.title: JFK Born
events.description: John Fitzgerald Kennedy born in Brookline, Massachusetts

events.title: World War II
events.description: Kennedy serves in the U.S. Navy during World War II

events.title: PT-109 Incident
events.description: Kennedy's PT boat rammed by Japanese destroyer; his heroic actions save crew

events.title: Elected to Congress
events.description: Kennedy elected to U.S. House of Representatives

events.title: Elected to Senate
events.description: Kennedy elected U.S. Senator from Massachusetts

events.title: Marries Jackie
events.description: Marries Jacqueline Bouvier in Newport, Rhode Island

events.title: Pulitzer Prize
events.description: Wins Pulitzer Prize for 'Profiles in Courage'

events.title: Presidential Campaign
events.description: Kennedy campaigns for President against Richard Nixon

events.title: First TV Debate
events.description: First televised presidential debate against Nixon

events.title: Elected President
events.description: Narrowly defeats Nixon to become 35th President

events.title: Inauguration
events.description: Inaugurated as President; 'Ask not what your country can do for you'

events.title: Peace Corps Created
events.description: Establishes the Peace Corps by executive order

events.title: Bay of Pigs
events.description: Failed invasion of Cuba at Bay of Pigs

events.title: Moon Speech
events.description: Commits U.S. to landing man on moon before end of decade

events.title: Glenn Orbits Earth
events.description: John Glenn becomes first American to orbit Earth

events.title: Cuban Missile Crisis
events.description: 13-day confrontation with Soviet Union over missiles in Cuba

events.title: Civil Rights Address
events.description: Delivers major civil rights address to the nation

events.title: Berlin Speech
events.description: Delivers 'Ich bin ein Berliner' speech in West Berlin

events.title: March on Washington
events.description: Supports March on Washington where MLK gives 'I Have a Dream' speech

events.title: Assassination
events.description: Assassinated in Dallas, Texas
